channel.title: tomatos on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan
channel.description: Recent content in tomatos on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan

item.title: groundforce afternoon
item.description: originally our plans for the pentecost weekend had been to do a two day walk in the napf area, a rather nice walking area between lucerne and berne. originally… well, two weeks ago we set out to find the “across einsiedeln” geocache — which was supposed to be a rather simple one in easy terrain. as the weather was quite warm i didn’t put on my mountain boots but instead went in sandals — had i but known… we did find the GPS location of the “across einsiedeln” geocache, but didn’t find the cache itself.
